allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add LGA & Town Discovery module with real ABS and TRA data

Implements comprehensive Australian tourism discovery system with official
government data sources and production-ready database schema.

## New Features

### Discovery Module (src/discovery/)
- LGA Collector: Downloads 552 LGAs from ABS ASGS 2025
- Tourism Region Collector: Loads 76 official Tourism Regions from TRA
- State Tourism Org Collector: Manages 8 state-level tourism bodies  
- Town Collector: Tracks 125+ towns with 10k+ population
- Tourism Finder: Website discovery for all entity types
- Tech Profiler: Technology stack detection for tourism websites

### Database Schema (migrations/002_lga_town_discovery.sql)
- Nullable FK pattern for entity-website mapping
- 552 LGAs with official ABS codes
- 76 Tourism Regions with 2,452 SA2 area mappings
- 8 State Tourism Organizations
- 125+ Towns
- Comprehensive views and materialized analytics

### Data Integration
- Real ABS LGA data (auto-download from abs.gov.au)
- Real TRA Tourism Regions (tourism-regions-allocations-2025.xlsx)
- SA2 area coverage using PostgreSQL arrays with GIN indexes
- Support for OT (Other Territories) state

### Tools & Scripts
- CLI tool for Fathom platform (tools/lga_discovery_tool.py)
- Migration scripts (apply_migration.py, apply_constraint_fix.py)
- Data loading script (load_initial_data.py)
- Verification scripts (verify_schema.py, query_wa_supabase.py)

### Tests
- ABS download test (test_abs_download.py) - 552 LGAs
- TRA data test (test_tra_data.py) - 76 Tourism Regions
- Discovery module integration test (test_discovery.py)

### Dependencies
- pandas>=2.0.0 (Excel parsing)
- openpyxl>=3.1.0 (Excel file support)

## Technical Implementation

- Nullable FK pattern: Ensures exactly ONE entity FK per website
- GIN indexes on SA2 coverage arrays for fast containment searches
- Materialized views for tech stack analytics
- Comprehensive overview view unioning all entity types
- Production-ready Supabase deployment

## Documentation
- REAL_DATA_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md: Complete implementation guide
- Inline SQL comments and COMMENT ON statements
EOF
)")
